1122597661251518464.text: Carson and I are enjoying this beautiful Sunday! #CarsonTheTortoisepic.twitter.com/KmwqNdpX6P

1121851440144666624.text: My Southern Nevada team was honored to be at yesterday's grand opening ceremony for the new @LVCCLD East Las Vegas Library! With art galleries, computers, and, of course, lots of books, this new library is a great addition to the eastside community.pic.twitter.com/lSgIZmS1Wc

1122909483749888000.text: Wishing @RepHorsford a happy birthday today! Thank you for being a champion for Nevadans in Congress!

1122920296636239872.text: Thank you to local law enforcement @LVMPD for responding so quickly to keep the students, faculty, & staff safe. I had the pleasure of meeting with some students from @svsschoollv recently at my office in Carson City.https://twitter.com/FOX5Vegas/status/1122911037592702981 …

1121523057762369537.text: My daughter Ashley is visiting me in Carson City this week. She planted this little garden for Carson. All organic and all tortoise-approved! #CarsonTheTortoisepic.twitter.com/NBcvuTO1P8

1121559538560323585.text: Love meeting Nevada youth from all over the state when they visit the Capitol to learn more about our state’s government and rich history. Thanks @svsschoollv students for stopping by my office!pic.twitter.com/vcLm8NIEVE

1123279926948315136.text: I'm proud to appoint Rosa Solis-Rainey to the NV Gaming Commission. Rosa is a highly experienced litigator who has been involved in some of the state’s most complex legal issues over the past 18 years. I'm confident she’ll make an outstanding addition to the commission.pic.twitter.com/0OWOXDMNLp

1123265571917680641.text: Ahead of tomorrow's @EPWGOP hearing on #Yucca, I sent a letter to the committee reiterating Nevada's strong opposition to Yucca Mtn. Let me be clear: I am totally opposed to any legislative effort to restart the Yucca Mountain project. http://gov.nv.gov/uploadedFiles/govnewnvgov/Content/News/Press/2019_Images/2019-04-26_GovSisolakLetterToSenateEPW.pdf …

1123343067732295680.text: Nevada is lucky to have a relentless fighter like @SenCortezMasto on our side. I'm so grateful for her leadership and am committed to working w/ our entire federal delegation to ensure @SecretaryPerry keeps his word to Nevadans.https://twitter.com/reviewjournal/status/1123329929763069952 …

1121540135760216065.text: Children of state employees have enjoyed #TakeYourChildToWorkDay  at offices across state government in both Northern and Southern Nevada! These kids are learning about the vital roles their parents play in keeping our state running and serving Nevadans.pic.twitter.com/Lex8s5COmq

1121954631205044225.text: Enjoyed having dinner with my daughter Ashley at San Marco’s Grill in Carson City. Incredible food and the staff was so friendly and attentive. Really enjoyed it!pic.twitter.com/rbHLKu3jOe

1122263488691232768.text: Devastated to learn of the shooting at Chabad of Poway synagogue in California. Kathy and I send our love and sympathies to those affected and the entire Jewish community.

1121902807596929024.text: I was honored to speak at the graduation ceremony for Class 15 of Nevada’s Certified Public Manager program. 33 outstanding state employees completed 300 hours of training to earn this distinction. I’m so proud of them and all their hard work in service of Nevadans!pic.twitter.com/VUaBqzIhqB

1122642043103170560.text: The First Lady is honored to attend “Wine, Women and Shoes,” a fundraiser for @StJude Ranch for Children.pic.twitter.com/tsC9M6KuD1

1121867387228135424.text: Carson is really enjoying the beautiful spring weather now that he’s awake from his winter brumation. Dandelions are his treat of choice! #CarsonTheTortoisepic.twitter.com/MCKIAYedeu

1123367522978263040.text: Saddened and horrified to hear of another shooting on an American campus. The First Lady and I send our thoughts and prayers to the people of North Carolina.https://www.cbsnews.com/news/uncc-active-shooter-reported-today-live-updates-2019-04-30/ …

1121836166909579264.text: Thanks to @UWSN for stopping by my office today for UWSN Day at #nvleg and for all the incredible work you do for families in Southern Nevada!pic.twitter.com/f43lHtam22
